headline: J.B. Hunt Recognizes 54 Drivers for Million Mile Safety Accomplishments
summary: LOWELL, Ark., April 30, 2025--J.B. Hunt recognized 54 company drivers this week for achieving two-plus million safe miles driven during its annual Million Mile Celebration.
